The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 08 December is 1,501,179 (2,667 cases per 100,000 population). In the seven days to 03 December, there were 83,998 new confirmed cases (149.2 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 26 November, there were 91,558 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 8% (7,560 fewer cases).
